rules_text:
Whenever Kessig Jeweler attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
{1}{R}: Transform Kessig Jeweler. Activate only if it’s attacking.
rules_text2:
At the beginning of your first main phase, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card and create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if Kessig Tombrobber didn’t attack this turn, transform it.
